div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1116 Olbia (mod. Parutino), 1954 Burial: late 3rd-early 2nd cent. B.C. Contents: 5 AE. In ancient pit Olbia: AE (as AMNG I.1, pl. 9, 12 [1], 26-29 [1]; pl. 10, 5 [2], 13 [1]) Disposition: Leningrad (Institute) Information from P. O. Karyszkowski
